content.question: Task 3: Conversation You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. There will be six times when it is your turn to speak. Introduction: You will have a conversation with Wang Yuanhang, the director of a summer Chinese-language program in Taipei, Taiwan, in which you interview for a job as an assistant. Response 1
